Name: worker_must_have_skill
Description: A worker assigned to a task requiring a specific skill must possess that skill.

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total cost of the project must not exceed the allocated budget.

Name: team_velocity_capacity
Description: The sum of story points in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's average velocity.

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: The total effort of tasks assigned to a worker in a sprint cannot exceed their availability.

Name: prefer_senior_for_complex_tasks
Description: Prefer assigning tasks with a high effort estimate to workers with a high skill level.

Name: user_story_dependency
Description: If UserStory A depends on UserStory B, B must be completed in a sprint before or in the same sprint as A.

Name: worker_cannot_be_on_vacation
Description: A worker whose status is 'vacation' cannot be assigned to any task.

Name: sprint_must_have_goal
Description: Every sprint must be associated with exactly one sprint goal.

Name: feature_must_be_in_release
Description: A feature intended for release must be assigned to a release plan.

Name: prefer_higher_priority_features
Description: Favor including features with a higher priority in the release plan.

Name: epic_must_contain_stories
Description: An Epic cannot be considered for a sprint unless it is broken down into at least one user story.

Name: team_size_constraints
Description: The size of a team should remain within the ideal range (e.g., 3 to 9 members).
